#Text=Mako says : " This is right around the area where the attacks happened .
#Text=Keep quiet .
#Text=Mouth zipped , do n't say a word .
#Text=That 's the best thing to do when you 're trying to ambush somebody , which is what we 're doing here , and it 's basically what I 'm always doing .
#Text=I mean , I am a gangster , after all , and - " Mako says : " Two Toed Ping , please .
#Text=" Two Toed Ping says : " Oh , right .
#Text=So , what 's it like dating the Avatar .
#Text=Come on , Mako , I got ta know .
#Text=" Mako says : " Ping , stay focused !
#Text=" Two Toed Ping says : " What ?
#Text=What are you so weird about it ?
#Text=If I was dating the Avatar , I 'd tell you all about it .
#Text=" Mako says : " There 's nothing to know .
#Text=I broke up with her .
#Text=" Asami says : " You broke up ?
#Text=When ?
#Text=Why did n't you tell me ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I do n't know .
#Text=" Two Toed Ping says : " Yeah , right .
#Text=You broke up with the Avatar .
#Text=Like that happened .
#Text=Hey , Shady Shin , Viper .
#Text=Mako says he broke up with the Avatar .
#Text=" Shady Shin says : " Sure he did .
#Text=" Viper says : " Yeah , I did too .
#Text=" Mako says : " All right , would you guys knock it off and do your job ?
#Text="
